p: HPV vaccines are still expensive in Lebanon, not yet recommended by all pediatricians and not offered by the Lebanese government as part of the national immunization program. The ministry of health in Lebanon should implement a systemic approach for HPV vaccination similar to that initiated by an international organization, GAVI, who helped 30 countries to introduce HPV vaccines into their national immunization programs with the aim to protect around 40 million girls from cervical cancer by 2020 [ 49, 50].
